Original Text: \E一行はさらに先へと進んだ…
\E商隊の馬車に乗せてもらったぞ…！
Machine translation: \EI got a ride on the merchant caravan's carriage...!
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We got a ride on a merchant caravan's carriage!

Original Text:
\E美味しそうな果実を見つけた！
\c[7]休憩回数+1\c[0]
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We found some delicious looking fruits! 
\c[7]+1 rest attempt\c[0]!

Original Text: \Eこれは…！道端で\c[7]えっちな本\c[0]を拾った！
Machine translation: \EThis is...! I found an erotic book on the roadside!\c[7]
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]This is...! I picked up a \c[7]naughty book\c[0] on the side of the road!

Original Text: \E旅の途中いい感じの木陰で休息した。
Machine translation: \EI took a rest in a nice shady spot during my journey.
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We took a rest in a nice secluded spot during our journey.

Original Text: \Eこれは…！道端で\c[7]コンドーム\c[0]を拾った！
Machine translation: \EThis is...! I found a \c[7]condom\c[0] on the roadside!
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]This is...! I picked up a \c[7]condom\c[0] on the side of the road!

Original Text:
\E同士！
…こ、ここに罠を仕掛けておきましょう！

\Eお弁当を差し入れてもらった…！
\c[7]休憩回数+1\c[0]
Machine translation:
\EI received a boxed lunch as a treat...!
\c[7]Number of breaks +1\c[0]
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We got a lunchbox from Yukari-san...! 
\c[7]+1 rest attempt\c[0]!

Original Text: \E笹食ってる場合じゃねえが現れた！
Machine translation: \ESomeone appeared when I was eating bamboo leaves!

Original Text: \E強い日差しに体力を奪われる…。
Machine translation: \EI'm drained of energy by the intense sunlight...
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]The intense sunlight is draining our energy...

Original Text: \E落とし物をしたらしい…来た道を戻った。
Machine translation: \EIt seems like they dropped something... They went back the way they came.
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]I think I dropped something... I'm retracing my steps.

Original Text: \E難所を抜けるまで休憩出来なさそうだ…。
Machine translation: \EIt doesn't seem like we can take a break until we pass this difficult place...
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]It seems unlikely that we'll be able to rest until 
we make it through this challenging part...

Original Text: \Eなんだかお尻がムズムズする…。
Machine translation: \EMy butt feels itchy for some reason...
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]My butt feels itchy for some reason...

Original Text:
\Eグレムリンに食料を台無しにされた…。
\c[7]休憩回数-1\c[0]
Machine translation:
\EMy food was ruined by a gremlin...
\c[7]Number of breaks -1\c[0]

Original Text: \E確かこの先を曲がれば近道なはず…
Machine translation: \EI'm sure if we turn here, it should be a shortcut...
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]If I remember correctly, taking a turn ahead should be a shortcut...

Original Text: \E近道でだいぶ先までこれた！
Machine translation: \EI was able to come quite far ahead by taking a shortcut!
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We were able to come quite far ahead by taking a shortcut!

Original Text: \Eこの先で荷車が立ち往生してしまったらしい…。
Machine translation: \EIt seems that a cart has gotten stuck ahead...
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Looks like there's a cart that has gotten stuck ahead...

Original Text:
\Eお礼の食べ物を貰った…！
\c[7]休憩回数+1\c[0]
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We got some food as a token of gratitude...! 
\c[7]+1 rest attempt\c[0]!

Original Text: \E謝礼を頂いてしまった！\c[7]\cself[13]\c[0]Gを手に入れた！
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We received a token of gratitude! \c[7]\cself[13]G obtained\c[0]!

Original Text: \Eありがとうございます！ぜひこれを…
Machine translation: \EThank you very much! Please take this...
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Thank you very much! Please take this...

Original Text: \E後ろ髪引かれつつ先を急ぐ…。
Machine translation: \EHastily moving forward while being pulled by the hair from behind...
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Quickly moving forward while reluctantly leaving something behind...

Original Text: \Eありがとうございます…この御恩は決して忘れません…！
Machine translation: \EThank you very much... I will never forget this kindness...!
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Thank you very much... I will never forget this kindness...!

Original Text: \Eどうかお願いです…村を脅かすあいつを退治してください…！
Machine translation: \EPlease... I beg you... Please defeat the one threatening the village...!
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Please, I beg of you... Please eliminate the one threatening our village...!

Original Text:
\Eグゥォォォオオオォォォ！
何者かのほう哮が響き渡る…
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Gwooooooo!
The roar of an unknown entity echoes...

Original Text:
\Eすいませーん！
ボール取ってくれますかー？
Machine translation:
\EExcuse me! 
Could you please get the ball for me?
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Excuse me! 
Could you please get the ball for me?

Machine translation: I will give it to you.

Original Text:
\Eざんねん！
それは私のタマタマだ！
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]What a shame! 
That is my ball-ball!

Original Text: \Eなんとボールは暴れひよこ牛だった！
Machine translation: \EThe ball turned out to be a wild chick cow!
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]The ball turned out to be a wild chick-cow!
